00042 WXPerl::WXPerl() {
00043     //ctor
00044     my_perl = perl_alloc();
00045     perl_construct(my_perl);
00046 
00047     perl_parse(my_perl, xs_init, 3, embed, NULL);
00048     PL_exit_flags |= PERL_EXIT_DESTRUCT_END;
00049     perl_run(my_perl);
00050 }

00052 WXPerl::~WXPerl() {
00053     //dtor
00054     perl_destruct(my_perl);
00055     perl_free(my_perl);

00058 wxString WXPerl::login() {
00059     dSP;
00060     ENTER;
00061     SAVETMPS;
00062     char *myargs[] = { NULL };
00063     eval_pv("require('scripts/vtiger.pl');", TRUE);
00064     call_argv("getSession", G_KEEPERR | G_EVAL | G_DISCARD | G_NOARGS, myargs);
00065     SPAGAIN;
00066         if (SvTRUE(ERRSV))
00067         {
00068             wxString erro = wxString::FromUTF8(SvPV_nolen(ERRSV));
00069             wxMessageBox( erro ,_T("---VTGUI---"));
00070             printf ("Uh oh - %s\n", SvPV_nolen(ERRSV));
00071             POPs;
00072         }
00073     char *session = SvPV_nolen(get_sv("session", 0));
00074     return wxString::FromAscii(session) ;
00075 }

00077 wxArrayString WXPerl::loadProjects(wxString& session) {
00078     dSP;
00079     //const char * ch =  session.mb_str();
00080     size_t len = session.length();

00082     strcpy( tmp, session.mb_str() );
00083     char *myargs[] = { tmp , NULL };
00084     // chama sub &loadProjects($sessao)
00085     call_argv("getProjectNames", G_EVAL | G_DISCARD, myargs);
00086     SPAGAIN;
00087         if (SvTRUE(ERRSV))
00088         {
00089             wxString erro = wxString::FromUTF8(SvPV_nolen(ERRSV));
00090             wxMessageBox( erro ,_T("---VTGUI---"));
00091             printf ("Uh oh - %s\n", SvPV_nolen(ERRSV));
00092             POPs;
00093         }
00094     AV* avPrj   = get_av("project_name", 0);
00095     int ln = av_len(avPrj);
00096     wxArrayString * prjNames = new wxArrayString();
00097     SV** svPrj;
00098     wxString name;
00099     for (int i = 0; i < ln + 1; i++){
00100         svPrj  = av_fetch(avPrj, i, 0);
00101         name = wxString::FromAscii(SvPV_nolen(* svPrj));
00102         prjNames->Add(name);
00103     }
00104     return * prjNames;
00105 }

00141 wxProjectStructure WXPerl::loadProjectDetails(wxString &name) {
00142 
00143     dSP;
00144     // preparing the stack for perl sub call
00145     ENTER;
00146     SAVETMPS;
00147     PUSHMARK(SP);
00148 
00149     size_t len = name.length();
00150     char* tmp = new char [ len + 1 ];
00151     strcpy( tmp, name.mb_str() );
00152     // push parameters to perl
00153     XPUSHs(sv_2mortal(newSVpv(tmp, 0)));
00154     PUTBACK;
00155     call_pv("loadProjectDetails", G_EVAL | G_DISCARD);
00156     SPAGAIN;
00157         if (SvTRUE(ERRSV))
00158         {
00159             wxString erro = wxString::FromUTF8(SvPV_nolen(ERRSV));
00160             wxMessageBox( erro ,_T("---VTGUI---"));
00161             printf ("Uh oh - %s\n", SvPV_nolen(ERRSV));
00162             POPs;
00163         }
00164     // load the hash from perl environment to wxHashMap prjDetails
00165     HV* hvPrj   = get_hv("project_details", 0);
00166     wxProjectStructure prjDetails;
00167     SV*  val;
00168     I32  retlen;
00169     char * key;
00170     int h = hv_iterinit(hvPrj);
00171     while (val = hv_iternextsv(hvPrj, &key, &retlen) ){
00172         wxString wxsVal;
00173         wxString wxsKey;
00174         wxsVal = wxString::FromAscii(SvPV_nolen( val ));
00175         wxsKey = wxString::FromAscii( key );
00176         prjDetails[wxsKey] = wxsVal;
00177     }
00178 
00179     // clear perl context memory space
00180     FREETMPS;
00181     LEAVE;
00182 
00183     return prjDetails;
00184 }
